item.description:
This months NEPN online photography challenge is Family!

  • How you interpret Family is entirely up to you.
  • Please no porn (I know that is subjective - just keep it tasteful.).
  • Photo must be taken during the month of February 2009.
  • Up to 5 photos may be posted per member.

Please email me with questions. Looking forward to all your family shots.

You do not need to RSVP. Simply post your pictures!

Eileen
About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: Post your challenge photos to the correct photo gallery in our site.
item.name: NEPN Photography Challenge: February 2009: Family
